remarks: The topology of an image structure.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Aug-2015.)
statement:
imastps.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( F "s R ) ) $.
imastps.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
imastps.f $e |- ( ph -> F : V -onto-> B ) $.
imastopn.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. W ) $.
imastopn.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` R ) $.
imastopn.o $e |- O = ( TopOpen ` U ) $.
imastopn $p |- ( ph -> O = ( J qTop F ) ) $.
